transcript: All those futile moralists that try to make life unbearable, laugh at them, be flippant, laugh at everything, all their sacred shivilets.

segments.text: All those futile moralists that try to make life unbearable, laugh at them, be flippant, laugh at everything, all their sacred shivilets.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: All those futile moralists that try to make life unbearable.  Laugh at them.  Be flippant.  Laugh at everything.  All their sacred shibboleths.
